name: Inteligence
description: The capacity of this character to learn new skills, analyse his surrounding and better understand himself and others

name: Health
description: The physical wellness of an character, directly affecting his stamina and mood. Determine the maximum energy of the character

name: Attractiviness
description: The pyshical natural attractiviness of a character, represting the lack of any unattractive feature or deformity

name: Charisma
description: The capacity of this character to convice, enchant and persuade people to adopt his views or ideals

name: Leadership
description: The capacity of the character to inspire, coordinate and help his peers
